question: Please tell me a dua for having children.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Hopelessness of Acquiring a Son

O My Lord! Grant me from Yourself a progeny that is pure; for You are the
Granter of prayers (Juz 3 Rk.12)
By the excessive recitation of the above verse, a person will, Insha Allah,
acquire a virtuous and righteous son.

Virtuous Children
O My Lod! Do not leave me without offspring. Surely, you are the best of
inheritors. (Juz 17 Rk6)

Recite the above Aayat three times after every Salaat. Good and righteous
children will be granted, Insha Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
